channel.title: [377] Project Forgotten PK
channel.description:
[size=15pt][b]Forgotten PK - Development[/b][/size]
[i]Pictures will be posted in the morning.[/i]
Well, I'm going to post a development topic of my server.
THERE WILL BE [B][U]NO[/U][/B] ADVERTISING.
[B]Current updates - BIG[/B] I've added a whole new DT quest, tons of new NPC dialogue. I've fixed up a new client instead of bluurs. The forums have been massively updated. Mage has been perfected. Fixed the bug where you could force yourself to log. Fixed xLogging Fixed when you ran outa arrows you made everyone around you Null. Fixed some lag issues.
[B]Current updates - Small[/B] Spread out shops more for less lag. Finally added NPC's placed as they are in RuneScape. Fixed a bunch of shops. Added B2P Added B2B Edited the health bar to stay at 0 when you die, not start a new health bar. Made prayer drain exactly like runescape, 1 by 1, not by like 10. Fixed a glitch in NPC dialogue where the NPC appeared Disfigured. Made it so you can only log in with MY client and when it's updated it will say "The client has been updated, check the forums for the new one"
[B]Updates I need to work on - [/B] Fix mage so you stop attacking a player, then mage 2 seconds after. A few small bugs Add a few more shops Add Lost City quest Add MM.
[size=6pt]This is RichScape source[/size]

item.title: [377] Project Forgotten PK
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

1) Help topics: This is not a section for getting help. Do not use this one to ask for help, your topic will be locked. Instead, post in Server Help.
  1. Advertising: This section is for showing off (flaunting) your work, not advertising your server and/or forums. Do so and you will be rewarded with a mute or ban.

3) Development teams: None of these. We can make exceptions to this rule, pm a staff member first, please.

4) New topics: You must post at least a few pictures of your Development. If you do not, we cannot believe you. You may substitute this with a video. Why pictures/video? So you have proof you did something. Also, topic titles must follow this.

  1. Projects: This is not the place to post minor projects, such as, changing spawn locations, adding a few commands then saying you will release. We want something more major than that, seeing as all you do to change spawn locations is change a number and you’re done. We don’t want to see that you can change a number, we want to see that you can create something that will change the server in such a way that it’ll make it funner and more enjoyable for the players, or that you can change the game code to make it more efficient at doing a certain task or to have more stability overall.

Read full topic

item.title: [377] Project Forgotten PK
item.dc:creator: @xlxoxoxt xlxoxoxt
item.description:
@xlxoxoxt wrote:

[size=15pt]Forgotten PK - Development[/size]

Pictures will be posted in the morning.

Well, I’m going to post a development topic of my server.

THERE WILL BE NO ADVERTISING.

Current updates - BIG
I’ve added a whole new DT quest, tons of new NPC dialogue.
I’ve fixed up a new client instead of bluurs.
The forums have been massively updated.
Mage has been perfected.
Fixed the bug where you could force yourself to log.
Fixed xLogging
Fixed when you ran outa arrows you made everyone around you Null.
Fixed some lag issues.

Current updates - Small
Spread out shops more for less lag.
Finally added NPC’s placed as they are in RuneScape.
Fixed a bunch of shops.
Added B2P
Added B2B
Edited the health bar to stay at 0 when you die, not start a new health bar.
Made prayer drain exactly like runescape, 1 by 1, not by like 10.
Fixed a glitch in NPC dialogue where the NPC appeared Disfigured.
Made it so you can only log in with MY client and when it’s updated it will say “The client has been updated, check the forums for the new one”

Updates I need to work on -
Fix mage so you stop attacking a player, then mage 2 seconds after.
A few small bugs
Add a few more shops
Add Lost City quest
Add MM.

[size=6pt]This is RichScape source[/size]
